revised_title: Two Books on Horticulture and Vineyard Management
tldr: This article discusses two books on horticulture and vineyard management. The first book focuses on Euclid's geometry and provides a concise and practical edition for easier understanding. The second book, written by Mr. John Rose, offers advice on choosing the right fruit and planting vineyards in England. It covers topics such as soil and site selection, planting techniques, pruning, and managing vineyards. The author believes that with proper care and following his recommendations, vineyards in England can be successful.
